name: Redlight Chain
description: Redlight Chain ($REDLC) aims to solve the Blockchain Trilemma of Scalability, Decentralization and Security through the optimization of our gasless blockchain. Redlight Chain is a Layer 1 EVM (Ethereum Virtual Machine)[1] compatible Blockchain, however it introduces revolutionary changes to the traditional EVM compatible blockchains. Providing a bridge from DeFi to real world business powered by Redlight Chains gasless layer 1 blockchain.
